title: Mastery Page "Swapability" or Order
body:
Hello everyone,
I'd just like to say (specifically to Riot employees and designers) that I would very much appreciate it if the mastery page numbers could be swapped around. It is a very minor annoyance, but something that would improve the game flow of creating masteries. 
What I mean is that there is no way to swap mastery pages between two spots i.e. swapping Mastery Page #1 with the position of Mastery Page #8. It is a simple organisation improvement for the players so that when a player must change from a Jarvan IV Top Lane set-up to a Jarvan IV Jungle set-up (for various reasons) it would easier to locate them with previous organising of mastery pages into groups by the players. 
A good idea might be to enable the "For this champion(s) only" feature with Mastery Pages to reduce visual "noise" similar to the Item Pages present.
I feel that this would smooth out the interface and overall the pre-game experience.

If I somehow missed this type of feature please let me know. Thanks for your time.

P.S. Same feature for Rune Pages (but not as important).

replies.body:
not saying its a bad idea though, maybe if you attached the things to the champion instead of the other way around.

example: 
jarvan > item sets
           > runes
           > masteries

not really;
finish your masteries+ finish your item set+ finish your runes + change it if you need to swap champs

I hope that makes sense
they would need to change the layout of the mastery page if they were to make it champion specific and I can't really see it fitting in well with the perk tree style.
